snippet: Moving beyond catalogs and souvenirs, art museums are viewing their stores as extensions of their missions, offering jewelry, clothing and items for the home.
abstract: Many art museums are updating their stores beyond catalogs, souvenirs and knickknacks to further establish their individual brand, offering increasingly sophisticated items like jewelry, clothing and home furnishings.
lead_paragraph: Moving beyond catalogs and souvenirs, art museums are viewing their stores as extensions of their missions, offering jewelry, clothing and items for the home.

headline.seo: Art Museums Use Stores to Establish Their Brands
headline.main: Come for the Art, Stay for the Shopping
headline.print_headline: Come for the Art, Stay for the Shopping
